creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
marks:
Signed and numbered
 Signed LR in graphite: [M]
provenance: (Richard Reed Armstrong, Chicago); sold to MIA, 2000.
text: The female form enchanted Artistide Maillola nd it remained a constant theme in his art.  In this woodcut Maillol used a variety of marks to represent the waves that  swirl around a radiant nude, but seem to hardly touch her.
title: La vague
